name: Geiger: Radioactive Horror
description:
YOU’RE ALONE. IT’S DARK. YOU’RE WEARING A HIGH-TECH HAZMAT SUIT. YOU KNEW THERE WOULD BE THE DANGERS OF RADIATION. BUT YOU NEVER EXPECTED A VISITOR.
CHECK THE LEVELS OF YOUR GEIGER COUNTER. 
TRY TO STAY CALM. 
SOMETHING’S WATCHING YOU.

This is a very short and simple horror game. It is a raycaster. Your only objective is to get to the exit on the far wall. All you have is a Geiger counter and minimal visor information.

Enjoy a quick scare.

Check out EvolGames.com for more of my projects.
